column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Open for dine in but everyone is required to wear a mask prior to entering the bakery. The fruit tart crust was crisp
column2: not too sweet. I had the mascarpone pastry which is a wonderful combination of brownie
column3: chocolate mouse and mascarpone with a touch of espresso....amazing pastry! The Father's Day special
column4: "the mustache" pastry is a chocolate mouse
